nodes.text: Markus Dorivonn was a Human male Jedi who served as a Guardian. Around the time of the Battle of Yavin, he worked with two other Force-sensitive individuals to search for a holocron at the Well of Shadows. He, Dal Kir and Zora Sasori found the Well of Shadows shortly after the Force-sensitive explorer, Kasuni Tamm, discovered it herself. Dorivonn attempted to convince Tamm to give him the holocron, but was interupted by Imperial Inquisitor Sor Venge and a contingent of stormtroopers. The group was able to escape the attackers with their prize.
Dorivonn appears in the introductory story and gameplay example for Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game book Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook.
